sell_excess.page_description: {{name}} helps to turn your excessive inventory into profits.
sell_excess.alertMessage: Request to sell excess stock successfully sent!

top.paragraph_1: Are you looking to sell your surplus stock that can’t be returned to the original supplier? We help many of our partners quickly and efficiently sell their electronic components overstocks.
top.paragraph_2: If you are OEM or EMS we can display your Excess Stock to our customers worldwide and help to sell it hassle-free. We will provide you with the efficient sales channel for your surplus components, whatever country you are in.

why_sell.title: Why sell your excessive stocks with ChipAssist

card_1.title: Access to the international market
card_1.text: Your excess stocks will become visible to ChipAssist’s customers and partners around the world.

card_2.title: Complete control and transparency
card_2.text: Manage your prices and order minimums. Update your stock data whenever you need it.

card_3.title: Fast and profitable deals
card_3.text: Direct customer connections and effective data integration help connect your excess inventory to the right audience.

card_4.title: Assistance with the deal
card_4.text: We take care of the delivery, paperwork, customs clearance, and quality check if needed.

how_works.li_1: You exchange excess stocks with us via XLS/CSV file or access to your API
how_works.li_2: We add your excess list to our database, enriching it with detailed information on components
how_works.li_3: Customers start finding your stocks and sending requests and/or orders
how_works.li_4: We contact you to negotiate the terms and prepare the order
how_works.form_title: Send us a request and we'll contact you about your stocks
how_works.name: Your name

sell_excess.title: helps turn your excessive inventory into profits.

home.page_title: Search electronic parts, components prices|Datasheets & inventory-{{name}}

mobile.p: Search for products and see market availability. Place your requests to 300+ sellers in one click. Order and track with

desktop.p: Search and compare prices and market availability. Contact sellers and get special prices right through

hero_item2.p: Place your request and get the dedicated offers from 300+ connected sellers from all over the world.

hero_item3.p: Order your product through ChipAssist and get safe and convinient purchasing and tracking.

connect.subtitle: You can buy from several suppliers at once and send requests for the components you need.

connect_item1.title: Join the trusted ecosystem
connect_item1.text: Engage with the network of 1000+ trusted clients worldwide.

connect_item2.title: Save marketing budget
connect_item2.text: Get ready-made customer`s requests right into your sales pipeline.

connect_item3.title: Manage your excess stocks
connect_item3.text: Quickly and efficiently sell your surpluses and overstocks on the market.

text.p2: with your software through our advanced API.

partners.title: Partner with
partners.subtitle: Partner with ChipAssist for API integrations, excess data stocks, user requests, and market trends to enhance your business capabilities. Gain an edge in the market and stay ahead of the curve.

pcb.subtitle: Just upload your Gerber files and engage with 50+ PCB suppliers to get the best offering in 48 hours.

ul.li1: Send us freeform PCB specification or specify all necessary details
ul.li2: Get professional assistance from our qualified engineering team
ul.li3: Choose the best terms from proposed quotations from different vendors
ul.li4: Control the quality of PCBs with our on-site QC team

home.title: Welcome to {{name}}!
home.page_description: Global marketplace for sourcing electronic components. To compare prices and monitor inventory, shop across 180 distributors & manufacturers, and 20 000 000 parts.

advanced_section.title: Advanced Search is the Key
advanced_section.paragraph_1: {{name}} is the place where you can find and order electronic components, Printed Circuit Boards (PCBs) and power supplies.
advanced_section.paragraph_2: {{name}} is an open eco-system for suppliers and service providers where you can offer your products and services to the audience worldwide.

workplace_section.title: Best Market Offering in 48 Hours
workplace_section.paragraph_1: {{name}} introduces the concept of Integrated Customer's Workplace (ICW) where all necessary routines of finding and ordering e-components can be done from any device, any place, any time.
workplace_section.line_1: Sending anonymous RFQs to the tens of suppliers from all over the world in one click
workplace_section.line_2: Getting a competitive price offering in 48 hours
workplace_section.line_3: Seamless logistics from every country and every supplier
workplace_section.line_4: One contact point for all of your requests, purchases and deliveries
workplace_section.line_5: Quality inspection, warranty support and return policy with no barriers
workplace_section.new_line2: Your every request is automatically sent to the tens of independent suppliers giving you the best possible price offering available on the market

bom_sections.title: Working with
bom_sections.paragraph_1: Load your BOM list and find and order all the needed parts all at once - review, check and modify proposed offerings.
bom_sections.paragraph_2: Reduce the risks by checking the “health” of your lists, prices surges and availability timeline.

excess_sections.paragraph_1: If you are OEM or EMS we can display your Excess Stock to our customers worldwide and sell it hassle-free.
excess_sections.paragraph_2: We will provide you with the efficient sales channel for your surplus components, whatever country you are in.

services_section.text_1: Engage with the PCB suppliers through data exchange and bidding and compare multiple prices and product specifications. Check your Gerber files for consistency. Choose from the world’s best PCB manufacturers.
services_section.text_2: Request prices and samples from numerous manufacturers of tailored bodies and cases for your electronic product. Get small amounts from 3D printing studios or professionally molten plastic products for larger amounts.
services_section.text_3: Team up with independent design houses to design you a PCB or a whole product. Only the best R&D teams provide you with solutions in a matter of days.
services_section.text_4: Explore the catalog of input controllers and custom silicone keyboards for embedded devices with options for immediate online ordering.
services_section.text_5: Anything, from small B&W led stripes to large full-colored screens, can be found within numerous categories of the marketplace.
services_section.text_6: No more blind shots. Compare offers and find a manufacturer that will meet your standards from within hundreds of European and world OEMs, ODMs and EMSs.

pcb.title: PCBs

column.count_rigid_error: One of layers count must be greater or equal to 1
column.comment_helper: (e.g. Panel in 2*3, size of the break-away rail, total 5 panels=total 30 individual boards)

calculator.title: PCB Specification Selection
calculator.board_type_hint: A single board or an array made of either the same kind of boards or a mix of different designs
calculator.x_out_hint: Bad PCBs existed in panel, If you do not accept the X-out Allowance in Panel, the cost will increase the cost of 30%
calculator.break_away_hint: Breakaway rails are used to accommodate a variety of odd board shapes and create the necessary clearance from component to board edge
calculator.route_process_hint: How those boards connected in the panel
calculator.different_hint: A number of different PCB design variations in one panel. Note that you will be charged extra if there is more than 1 variant in the panel
calculator.size_hint: Maximum width and length of the board
calculator.qty_hint: A quantity of PCBs/Panels you require
calculator.copper_layer_hint: Please specify if the copper layer is for top or bottom
calculator.soldermask_hint: Coating material used to mask or to protect selected area
calculator.silkscreen_legend_hint: Text that printed on board for component identification
calculator.fr4_tg_hint: Glass transition temperature for FR4 material
calculator.thermal_conductivity_hint: The thermal conductivity of a material is a measure of its ability to conduct heat. It is commonly denoted by k,λ, or K
calculator.rogers_hint: A special base material, a kind of RF PCB and High Frequency PCB, which have less lossy at high frequencies
calculator.structure_of_MCPCB_hint: This is for double-sided metal substrate boards (Aluminum or Copper Base). There are two structures to choose from according to whether the metal base is in the middle or the bottom.
calculator.min_spacing_hint: Minimum trace width / Minimum space between adjacent traces
calculator.edge_connector_hint: Gold plating over an edge connector
calculator.bevelling_hint: The connector PCI or other may need be beveled to make the entry of the board into the connector easier
calculator.surface_finish_hint: PCB Surface Finish to ensure solderability and protect exposed copper circuitry
calculator.via_process_hint: This parameter will be ignored if you send us a gerber file, so the PCB will be processed according to the file. Otherwise choose one of the 3 options.
calculator.finished_copper_hint: Weight of copper in ounces rolled out over an area of 1 square foot

top_elem.title: New way of working with RFQs
top_elem.subtitle: Many customers, one service
top_elem.p1: Get request from the customers worldwide
top_elem.p2: Compare your offer with competitive quotes

request_page.title: Work with incoming requests in a completely new way
request_page.subtitle: Get all your incoming requests for quotation (RFQs) streamlined and displayed in a convenient way.
request_page.p1: See all requests sorted by date with the origin country of the request and requested quantity for each MPN.

req_page_desc.p1: You can provide your stock, unit price, date code and lead time for every item you like. Additionally you can provide an alternative MPN and comments describing any information you would like to provide.
req_page_desc.p2: Once you have provided all the information required, just hit the “SEND DATA” button and your responses will be submitted to our database and provided to the customers.
req_page_desc.h: Use XLS format if you prefer
req_page_desc.p3: You also can export the list of the request to .xls file. This might be useful if you like to prepare your responses in .xls format.
req_page_desc.p4: If you see the item`s price field is yellow after the response, it means that another supplier has suggested a better price for this request. You can try reducing the price to provide a competitive offer.
req_page_desc.p5: If you are not yet subscribed to a daily requests list and don’t have an account at https://requests.chipassist.com please send us an email to connect@chipassist.com
req_page_desc.p6: If you already have an account you can visit https://requests.chipassist.com any time to see new requests and respond to them.
req_page_desc.subtitle: Time matters
req_page_desc.p7: Earlier received responses have better chances to be accepted by a customer. Due to this we suggest you to respond to the requests as fast as you can.
req_page_desc.p8: Received quotes are communicated to the customers. Due to this they should be valid for at least 72 hours. Please mind that if you are unable to supply the goods at the responded price, this fact might be considered as a mislead.

messages.title: Easy and convinient comunications with customers
messages.subtitle: Get all your incoming requests for quotaion (RFQs) streamlined and displayed in a convenient way.
messages.p1: See all requests sorted by date with the origin country of the request and requested quantity for each MPN.

po_i.title: Easily create and exchange Purchase Orders and Invoices
po_i.p1: Receive approved Purchase Orders (POs) from your custommers with all necessary details.
po_i.p2: Generate, preview and send Payment Invoices to your customers just in several clicks.

about_company.title: What is
about_company.page_title: About {{name}}: Global marketplace for sourcing electronic components.
about_company.page_description: {{name}} is a marketplace for electronic parts. Look up any electronic component you need in an easy way.Learn more about {{name}} now!
about_company.sub_header: Your Go-To Worldwide Marketplace for Electronic Components
about_company.search_tool_description: Our robust search engine allows for rapid and seamless comparison of millions of components. Easily select and purchase parts from distributors, making the sourcing process efficient and hassle-free.
about_company.bom_tool_description: With our intuitive BOM (Bill of Materials) tool, you can edit, save, and generate BOMs, providing a comprehensive snapshot of costs and product availability for your desired components. Stay informed about price fluctuations and availability timelines to mitigate risks and optimize your procurement strategy.
about_company.api_tool_description: Another key feature is our seamless API integration capability, which allows users to connect their own applications with the platform’s database of products and components, making data collection easier than ever before.

paragraph.firs: ChipAssist is the ultimate global marketplace for sourcing electronic parts and components. Our platform provides users with easy access to stock levels and costs from hundreds of international distributors of electronics by simply entering a manufacturer component number.
paragraph.second: ChipAssist offers more than just stock data to electronics professionals looking for thorough technical component data. Our extensive part specifications, datasheets, CAD models, images, and more are displayed, allowing customers to make faster purchasing decisions while still receiving accurate pricing and inventory availability comparisons from distributors.

first.p2: community now to maximize your ability to source electronic components. Experience a procurement process that is seamless, effective, and reliable.

second.p1: For more information about data, search results, and using ChipAssist please click

faq.page_description: ChipAssist is a search engine for electronic components. Find part information, confirm availability, and compare costs across thousands of manufacturers and hundreds of distributors.
faq.user_answer_1: ChipAssist is the ultimate global marketplace for sourcing electronic parts and components. Our platform provides users with easy access to stock levels and costs from hundreds of international distributors of electronics by simply entering a manufacturer component number.
faq.user_question_2: 2. What does it cost to use ChipAssist?
faq.user_question_3: 3. I have multiple item numbers. How do I search for them?
faq.user_answer_3: The main search box allows you to look up to 20 items at once. Spaces should be used to separate item numbers. Use the BOM upload tool to search for more than 20 items at once.
faq.user_answer_4: Various offers have minimum order and package requirements. The details of each offer are listed next to these minimums. There are no order minimums with ChipAssist.
faq.user_question_5: 5. When do I pay for my purchase?
faq.user_answer_5: Payment is subject to your contract's conditions. To learn more, please speak with your account manager. You can view your terms in the "Company Information" tab if you are already a customer.
faq.distributor_question_1: 1. How can I become a supplier on ChipAssist?
faq.distributor_answer_1: To become a supplier, you need to fill in the "Know Your Partner" form. Once you've completed the form, our team will contact you and provide access to the platform's tools.
faq.distributor_question_2: 2. Will a customer see our company's name on the platform?
faq.distributor_question_3: 3. How can I check the status of our quotation?
faq.distributor_answer_3: We have a supplier statistics system where you will be able to compare your prices with the best offer and track the status of your quotation.
faq.distributor_question_4: 4. How can I get our supplier's code?
faq.distributor_answer_4: Our suppliers do not have special codes, we use company names instead.
faq.distributor_question_5: 5. I have searched some parts from my inventory file, but I haven't seen my company listing on the search result.
faq.distributor_answer_5_1: 1. Stock is deemed outdated (by default 7 days).
faq.distributor_answer_5_2: Or you can agree on another convenient term of storage and publication of the offer with the manager of the platform.
faq.distributor_answer_5_3: 2. There was an error while uploading this line.
faq.distributor_question_6: 6. How can I send stock files to you?
faq.distributor_answer_6_2_1: In the near future, we expect to provide an interface that will allow you to upload stock files directly on the platform.
faq.distributor_answer_6_2_2: If you do not have an API, the preferred way is to deliver files by email to
faq.distributor_question_7: 7. How often do you think it will be reasonable to deliver files? Once a week?
faq.distributor_answer_7: That depends on how frequently changes occur. If new parts arrive and old ones are sold every day, we recommend updating the data on a daily basis.
faq.distributor_question_8: 8. How is the price on the website determined? Is it a supplier's price, or is there a markup?
faq.distributor_answer_8: The price listed on the website is the price set by the supplier themselves. A markup or discount may be applied by the supplier depending on their pricing strategy or current promotions.

options.p1: You have two options. You can use our
options.p3: sending a request for up to 20 products at once. Also you can upload your

terms.li1: Supplier - a company that a) provides its stocks for sale on Service Provider’s platform and/or b) was granted access to the rapid RFQ exchange service.
terms.li2: Service Provider - ChipAssist AG or its Authorised Partner.
terms.li3: Authorised Partner - ChipOnline, Serbia, performing purchasing of Components (materials), issuing invoices, and providing logistics services.
terms.li4: Components (materials) - any products of a Supplier intended for sale using the Service Provider’s platform.

list.li1: In relation to Components (materials) origin and compatibility

li1_subtitles.li1: supply Components (materials) that are not counterfeit or forgery.
li1_subtitles.li2: provide information regarding the original manufacturer.
li1_subtitles.li3: provide part-numbers cross-reference for the compatible Components (materials) as applicable.

list.li2: In relation to Components (materials) quality and condition:

li2_subtitles.li1: supply new Components (materials), unless otherwise explicitly agreed between the Supplier and the Service Provider on a case-by-case basis.
li2_subtitles.li2: supply Components (materials) in good condition, i.e. ensuring the performance according to the original characteristics.
li2_subtitles.li3: store and transport Components (materials) according to the corresponding requirements of an original manufacturer.
li2_subtitles.li4: inform the Service Provider regarding all possible issues related to the quality and condition of Components (materials), e.g. unreadable or unavailable marking and/or labelling, damaged or non-original packaging, storage conditions violation, etc.

li3_subtitles.li1: to provide a price for Components (materials) in order of priority: through API, in a stock file, on a request from the Service Provider.
li3_subtitles.li2: to fix the price for 72 hours after the moment of provision, unless otherwise separately agreed between the Supplier and the Service Provider.

li4_subtitles.li1: inform explicitly about warranty period and conditions.
li4_subtitles.li2: return any payments made by the Service Provider for the Components (materials) of inadequate quality or, in cases agreed with an end customer, provide a replacement. Transportation of Components (materials) and corresponding replacement the Supplier performs at own expense.

list.li5_subtitles: use and share with third parties information received from the Service Provider or retrieved from the ChipAssist.com site exclusively for the purpose of a) Components (materials) sales and b) promotion of the Service Provider’s platform.
list.footer: The Supplier acknowledges that the Service Provider can change these Terms and Conditions without separate notification to improve customers’ and own interests protection.

part2.p2: one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by ChipAssist and how we use it.

policy.p2: If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.

p3.p1: This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards  to the information that they shared and/or collect in ChipAssist. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website. Our Privacy Policy was created with the help of the

policy.by_using: By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
policy.p4: The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information.
policy.p5: If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.
policy.p6: When you register for an Account, we may ask for your contact information, including items such as name, company name, address, email address, and telephone number.
policy.p7: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to

list.li1: Provide, operate, and maintain our website
list.li2: Improve, personalize, and expand our website
list.li3: Understand and analyze how you use our website
list.li4: Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
list.li5: Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes

policy.p8: follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users movement on the website, and gathering demographic information.
policy.p9: You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of
policy.p10: Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on ChipAssist, which are sent directly to users browser. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on websites that you visit.

p11.p2: has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers.

policy.p12: Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.
policy.p13: You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers respective websites.
policy.CCPA: CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information)
policy.p14: Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to
policy.p15: Request that a business that collects a consumer`s personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.
policy.p16: Request that a business delete any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.
policy.p17: Request that a business that sells a consumer`s personal data, not sell the consumer`s personal data.
policy.p18: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
policy.p19: We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following
policy.p20: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.
policy.p21: The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.
policy.p22: The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
policy.p23: The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
policy.p24: The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
policy.p25: The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
policy.p26: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

USER GENERATED CONTRIBUTIONS

The Site does not offer users to submit or post content. We may provide you with the opportunity to create, submit, post, display, transmit, perform, publish, distribute, or broadcast content and materials to us or on the Site, including but not limited to text, writings, video, audio, photographs, graphics, comments, suggestions, or personal information or other material (collectively, `Contributions`). Contributions may be viewable by other users of the Site and through third-party websites. As such, any Contributions you transmit may be treated in accordance with the Site Privacy Policy. When you create or make available any Contributions, you thereby represent and warrant that:

  1. The creation, distribution, transmission, public display, or performance, and the accessing, downloading, or copying of your Contributions do not and will not infringe the proprietary rights, including but not limited to the copyright, patent, trademark, trade secret, or moral rights of any third party.
  2. You are the creator and owner of or have the necessary licenses, rights, consents, releases, and permissions to use and to authorize us, the Site, and other users of the Site to use your Contributions in any manner contemplated by the Site and these Terms of Use.
  3. You have the written consent, release, and/or permission of each and every identifiable individual person in your Contributions to use the name or likeness of each and every such identifiable individual person to enable inclusion and use of your Contributions in any manner contemplated by the Site and these Terms of Use.
  4. Your Contributions are not false, inaccurate, or misleading.
  5. Your Contributions are not unsolicited or unauthorized advertising, promotional materials, pyramid schemes, chain letters, spam, mass mailings, or other forms of solicitation.
  6. Your Contributions are not obscene, lewd, lascivious, filthy, violent, harassing, libelous, slanderous, or otherwise objectionable (as determined by us).
  7. Your Contributions do not ridicule, mock, disparage, intimidate, or abuse anyone.
  8. Your Contributions are not used to harass or threaten (in the legal sense of those terms) any other person and to promote violence against a specific person or class of people.
  9. Your Contributions do not violate any applicable law, regulation, or rule.
  10. Your Contributions do not violate the privacy or publicity rights of any third party.
  11. Your Contributions do not violate any applicable law concerning child pornography, or otherwise intended to protect the health or well-being of minors.
  12. Your Contributions do not include any offensive comments that are connected to race, national origin, gender, sexual preference, or physical handicap.
  13. Your Contributions do not otherwise violate, or link to material that violates, any provision of these Terms of Use, or any applicable law or regulation.

Any use of the Site or the Marketplace Offerings in violation of the foregoing violates these Terms of Use and may result in, among other things, termination or suspension of your rights to use the Site and the Marketplace Offerings.

CONTRIBUTION LICENSE

You and the Site agree that we may access, store, process, and use any information and personal data that you provide following the terms of the Privacy Policy and your choices (including settings).

By submitting suggestions or other feedback regarding the Site, you agree that we can use and share such feedback for any purpose without compensation to you.

We do not assert any ownership over your Contributions. We are not liable for any statements or representations in your Contributions provided by you in any area on the Site. You are solely responsible for your Contributions to the Site and you expressly agree to exonerate us from any and all responsibility and to refrain from any legal action against us regarding your Contributions.

SUBMISSIONS

You acknowledge and agree that any questions, comments, suggestions, ideas, feedback, or other information regarding the Site or the Marketplace Offerings (`Submissions`) provided by you to us are non-confidential and shall become our sole property. We shall own exclusive rights, including all intellectual property rights, and shall be entitled to the unrestricted use and dissemination of these Submissions for any lawful purpose, commercial or otherwise, without acknowledgment or compensation to you. You hereby waive all moral rights to any such Submissions, and you hereby warrant that any such Submissions are original with you or that you have the right to submit such Submissions. You agree there shall be no recourse against us for any alleged or actual infringement or misappropriation of any proprietary right in your Submissions.

THIRD-PARTY WEBSITES AND CONTENT

The Site may contain (or you may be sent via the Site or the Marketplace Offerings) links to other websites (`Third-Party Websites`) as well as articles, photographs, text, graphics, pictures, designs, music, sound, video, information, applications, software, and other content or items belonging to or originating from third parties (`Third-Party Content`). Such Third-Party Websites and Third-Party Content are not investigated, monitored, or checked for accuracy, appropriateness, or completeness by us, and we are not responsible for any Third Party Websites accessed through the Site or any Third-Party Content posted on, available through, or installed from the Site, including the content, accuracy, offensiveness, opinions, reliability, privacy practices, or other policies of or contained in the Third-Party Websites or the Third-Party Content. Inclusion of, linking to, or permitting the use or installation of any Third-Party Websites or any Third-Party Content does not imply approval or endorsement thereof by us. If you decide to leave the Site and access the Third-Party Websites or to use or install any Third-Party Content, you do so at your own risk, and you should be aware these Terms of Use no longer govern. You should review the applicable terms and policies, including privacy and data gathering practices, of any website to which you navigate from the Site or relating to any applications you use or install from the Site. Any purchases you make through Third-Party Websites will be through other websites and from other companies, and we take no responsibility whatsoever in relation to such purchases which are exclusively between you and the applicable third party. You agree and acknowledge that we do not endorse the products or services offered on Third-Party Websites and you shall hold us harmless from any harm caused by your purchase of such products or services. Additionally, you shall hold us harmless from any losses sustained by you or harm caused to you relating to or resulting in any way from any Third-Party Content or any contact with Third-Party Websites.

ADVERTISERS

We allow advertisers to display their advertisements and other information in certain areas of the Site, such as sidebar advertisements or banner advertisements. If you are an advertiser, you shall take full responsibility for any advertisements you place on the Site and any services provided on the Site or products sold through those advertisements. Further, as an advertiser, you warrant and represent that you possess all rights and authority to place advertisements on the Site, including, but not limited to, intellectual property rights, publicity rights, and contractual rights. We simply provide the space to place such advertisements, and we have no other relationship with advertisers.

SITE MANAGEMENT

We reserve the right, but not the obligation, to: (1) monitor the Site for violations of these Terms of Use; (2) take appropriate legal action against anyone who, in our sole discretion, violates the law or these Terms of Use, including without limitation, reporting such user to law enforcement authorities; (3) in our sole discretion and without limitation, refuse, restrict access to, limit the availability of, or disable (to the extent technologically feasible) any of your Contributions or any portion thereof; (4) in our sole discretion and without limitation, notice, or liability, to remove from the Site or otherwise disable all files and content that are excessive in size or are in any way burdensome to our systems; and (5) otherwise manage the Site in a manner designed to protect our rights and property and to facilitate the proper functioning of the Site and the Marketplace Offerings.

PRIVACY POLICY

We care about data privacy and security. By using the Site or the Marketplace Offerings, you agree to be bound by our Privacy Policy posted on the Site, which is incorporated into these Terms of Use. Please be advised the Site and the Marketplace Offerings are hosted in Germany. If you access the Site or the Marketplace Offerings from any other region of the world with laws or other requirements governing personal data collection, use, or disclosure that differ from applicable laws in Germany, then through your continued use of the Site, you are transferring your data to Germany, and you agree to have your data transferred to and processed in Germany.

TERM AND TERMINATION

Informal Negotiations

To expedite resolution and control the cost of any dispute, controversy, or claim related to these Terms of Use (each `Dispute` and collectively, the `Disputes`) brought by either you or us (individually, a `Party` and collectively, the `Parties`), the Parties agree to first attempt to negotiate any Dispute (except those Disputes expressly provided below) informally for at least thirty (30) days before initiating arbitration. Binding Arbitration

Restrictions

The Parties agree that any arbitration shall be limited to the Dispute between the Parties individually. login_form_as.sign_in_on: Sign in on the internal platform

types.confirm: Dear {{name}}! We have {{partNumber}} available. We can ship up to {{numInStock}}pcs at {{price}}{{symbol}} unit price{{datecode}}. If you are interested, please send us a Purchase Order (PO).
types.update_price: Dear {{name}}! Unfortunately, the unit price for {{partNumber}} was updated. Now we can ship up to ${numInStock}pcs at {{price}}{{symbol}} unit price{{datecode}}. If you are interested, please send us a Purchase Order (PO).
types.update_qty: Dear {{name}}! Thank you for your request. Currently we have only {{numInStock}} units of {{partNumber}} in stock. While we don't have the full quantity you requested, we believe this partial availability might still meet your immediate requirements. The unit price for this product is {{price}}{{symbol}}. If you are interested in this stock please send us a Purchase Order (PO).
types.out_stock: Dear {{name}}! Thank you for your request. Unfortunately, {{partNumber}} is currently out of stock. However, we are actively working to replenish our stock and expect {{partNumber}} to be available soon.
types.later: Dear {{name}}! Thank you for your request. We will provide you the details a bit later. Thank you!
